Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is set to take place in Memphis, Tennessee, on Wednesday at 8 p.m. EST with the Grizzlies favored by 1 point and an over/under of 226.5
Others: The Memphis Grizzlies went 27-55 overall, 14-37 in Western Conference games and 9-32 at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Los Angeles Lakers went 47-35 overall and 27-25 in Western Conference action during the 2023-24 season.

The Grizzlies have several injuries including John Konchar, Desmond Bane, Luke Kennard, Vince Williams Jr., Marcus Smart, GG Jackson II, and Cam Spencer, while the Lakers have Jarred Vanderbilt and Christian Wood out due to injuries.
